nodes.description: Obtain a few Sickles (in case of breaks) and head out to Wajaom Woodlands. Locate a Harvesting Point and harvest from the point until you get a Rainbow Berry. Some Harvesting Points can be found at (E-8/9, H-10 and H-13) Don't restrict your search to this location. You may want to take a chocobo. You must drop Invisible to harvest. Take care around sight aggro monsters. A useful strategy is to harvest with your inventory full so that the harvesting point doesn't get used up, but you can still harvest the key item.

nodes.title: Return to the Shararat Teahouse.
nodes.description: Return to the Shararat Teahouse. Be sure to make room in your inventory now to get the reward.

nodes.title: Speak with Ulamaal or Qutiba for a cutscene and an Imperial Silver Piece.
nodes.description: Speak with Ulamaal or Qutiba for a cutscene and an Imperial Silver Piece.

nodes.title: Speak with Camille in Wajaom Woodlands (M-7) for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Speak with Camille in Wajaom Woodlands (M-7) for a cutscene. Use the Whitegate exit under the south stairs at (H-10).

nodes.title: Choose to participate in Voidwatch operations to receive Amber Stratum Abyssite.
nodes.description: Choose to participate in Voidwatch operations to receive Amber Stratum Abyssite.

nodes.title: Defeat the 4 monsters: Dimgruzub in Arrapago Reef, Map 1 (I-10), (G-8), or (G-10) Atmacite Refiner t
nodes.description: Defeat the 4 monsters: Dimgruzub in Arrapago Reef, Map 1 (I-10), (G-8), or (G-10) Atmacite Refiner teleports you to Caedarva Mire (I-6) for entrance to map 1. Brekekekex in Caedarva Mire (I-11), (I-9) or (F-11) Atmacite Refiner teleports you to Caedarva Mire (H-10) next to Nashmau. Yalungur in Mamook (J-8), (L-8) or (?-?) Atmacite Refiner teleports you to Wajaom Woodlands (E-12) for entrance to map 1. Vanasarvik in Mount Zhayolm (M-6), (J-8), or (L-8) Atmacite Refiner teleports you to Mount Zhayolm (L-7).

nodes.title: Return to Camille to finish this quest, upgrade to Amber Stratum Abyssite II, and automatically begi
nodes.description: Return to Camille to finish this quest, upgrade to Amber Stratum Abyssite II, and automatically begin the next quest.

nodes.title: Speaking with Camille in Wajaom Woodlands (M-7) at the end of the previous quest automatically start
nodes.description: Speaking with Camille in Wajaom Woodlands (M-7) at the end of the previous quest automatically starts this quest.

nodes.title: Defeat the following monsters: Morta in Aydeewa Subterrane at (G-8) or (I-8) on Map 1, or (F-8) on M
nodes.description: Defeat the following monsters: Morta in Aydeewa Subterrane at (G-8) or (I-8) on Map 1, or (F-8) on Map 2 Atmacite Refiner teleports you to Bhaflau Thickets (I-7) for entrance to map 1.

nodes.title: Return to Camille to finish this quest.
nodes.description: Return to Camille to finish this quest.

nodes.title: Enter Salaheem's Sentinels in Aht Urhgan Whitegate (I-10), upstairs.
nodes.description: Enter Salaheem's Sentinels in Aht Urhgan Whitegate (I-10), upstairs. She directs you to the Imperial Whitegate. If you do not get the cutscene then proceed to next step at the Imperial Whitegate at (L-9)

nodes.title: Click the Imperial Whitegate door at (L-9) for a cutscene and an Imperial Missive.
nodes.description: Click the Imperial Whitegate door at (L-9) for a cutscene and an Imperial Missive. The quest is marked as active when this step is completed.

nodes.title: Make your way to Ru'Lude Gardens and check the Door: Audience Chamber at (H-6) for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Make your way to Ru'Lude Gardens and check the Door: Audience Chamber at (H-6) for a cutscene.

nodes.title: Go speak with the three nations' leaders: Speak with Iron Eater at (J-8) in the Metalworks to receiv
nodes.description: Go speak with the three nations' leaders: Speak with Iron Eater at (J-8) in the Metalworks to receive the Bastokan approval letter. Speak with Kupipi inside the Clerical Chambers of Heavens Tower to receive the Windurstian approval letter. Speak with Halver at (I-9) within the Chateau d'Oraguille to receive the San d'Orian approval letter.

nodes.title: Return to Ru'Lude Gardens and click the Door: Audience Chamber to receive the Jeunoan approval lette
nodes.description: Return to Ru'Lude Gardens and click the Door: Audience Chamber to receive the Jeunoan approval letter.

nodes.title: Go back to the Imperial Whitegate door at (L-9) for a cutscene and a Present for Megomak.
nodes.description: Go back to the Imperial Whitegate door at (L-9) for a cutscene and a Present for Megomak. Get some pickaxes and mine three Slabs of Plumbago in Mount Zhayolm or Halvung. Slabs of Plumbago can also be acquired from the Auction House. (Materials/Smithing) Slabs of Plumbago also drop from Troll Ironworkers and Troll Lapidarists in Halvung. Slabs of Plumbago also drop from Woodtroll Warriors and Woodtroll Dark Knights in Wajaom Woodlands. Slabs of Plumbago also drop from Hilltroll Warriors and Hilltroll Dark Knights in Mount Zhayolm.

nodes.title: Go to Mount Zhayolm and check the Acid-Eaten Door at the top sliver of (I-9) for a cutscene with Meg
nodes.description: Go to Mount Zhayolm and check the Acid-Eaten Door at the top sliver of (I-9) for a cutscene with Megomak. It's on the second floor of the Cerberus spawn area, in the troll ruins. He gives you Megomak's Shopping List.

nodes.title: (Megomak's precise location as seen in the attached picture, along with the fastest route there via
nodes.description: (Megomak's precise location as seen in the attached picture, along with the fastest route there via Halvung Staging Point)

nodes.title: Trade the three Slabs of Plumbago to the Acid-Eaten Door to receive a Lightning Cell from Megomak.
nodes.description: Trade the three Slabs of Plumbago to the Acid-Eaten Door to receive a Lightning Cell from Megomak.

nodes.title: Go to Nyzul Isle Staging Point and check the lamp for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Go to Nyzul Isle Staging Point and check the lamp for a cutscene.

nodes.title: Check the runic door to enter the battlefield with Alexander (like AU44 fight).
nodes.description: Check the runic door to enter the battlefield with Alexander (like AU44 fight). You have 15 minutes to complete the fight. Buffs and TP are lost upon entering. Unlike in Nashmeira's Plea, Alexander is not stationary. Spawns Alexander Images during the fight. If you fail, you need to trade three Slabs of Plumbago to Megomak again.

nodes.title: Upon winning you receive the Whisper of radiance.
nodes.description: Upon winning you receive the Whisper of radiance.

nodes.title: Return to the Imperial Whitegate door again for a CS.
nodes.description: Return to the Imperial Whitegate door again for a CS.

nodes.title: Head to Naja Salaheem to pick your reward.
nodes.description: Head to Naja Salaheem to pick your reward.

nodes.title: Visit Aydeewa Subterrane, Map 3 (G-10).
nodes.description: Visit Aydeewa Subterrane, Map 3 (G-10). The easiest way to get to Map 3 (G-10) is to enter Aydeewa Subterrane from Wajaom Woodlands (E-10) (marked as entrance 8 on the map). Once inside, follow the path south until you come to a ledge with some worms on the bottom. Drop and keep heading south. Take the first turn west and keep heading west to the ???. (Note: The ledge you drop off is at H-9, head West for only a short time and take the first path South - if you see a room with tigers then you're in the right place. Keep right as much as possible to help avoid aggro.)

nodes.title: Run through into the middle of the room and approach the stairs ruins (G-10) for a very short cutsce
nodes.description: Run through into the middle of the room and approach the stairs ruins (G-10) for a very short cutscene with NPC Wawaroon. The cutscene will start before you reach the base of the stairs. The cutscene WILL drop your Invisible effect, the moment the cutscene ends the level 64-68 chigoes nearby might aggro you. Recommend Blink and Stoneskin (if possible) before entering the room with the stairs if that represents a threat to the player.

nodes.title: Talk to Gaweesh in Al Zahbi at G-8, who will tell you to speak with Najelith in Wajaom Woodlands dur
nodes.description: Talk to Gaweesh in Al Zahbi at G-8, who will tell you to speak with Najelith in Wajaom Woodlands during her off-duty hours.

nodes.title: Obtain the Frayed Arrow by killing Aht Urhgan Attercops in Wajaom Woodlands or Bhaflau Thickets (rec
nodes.description: Obtain the Frayed Arrow by killing Aht Urhgan Attercops in Wajaom Woodlands or Bhaflau Thickets (recommended places: Wajaom's F-5 and F-6, which are near the next step). It may also be found under Auction House Category: Others > Misc.

nodes.title: Head to the Giwahb Watchtower at F-5 in Wajaom Woodlands and trade the Frayed Arrow to the door ther
nodes.description: Head to the Giwahb Watchtower at F-5 in Wajaom Woodlands and trade the Frayed Arrow to the door there for a cutscene to complete this sidequest. Be prepared to spend about 7 minutes or so in the cutscene.
